passed.name: BasedOnUbi
passed.description: Checking if the container's base image is based upon the Red Hat Universal Base Image (UBI)

passed.name: HasModifiedFiles
passed.description: Checks that no files installed via RPM in the base Red Hat layer have been modified

passed.name: HasLicense
passed.description: Checking if terms and conditions applicable to the software including open source licensing information are present. The license must be at /licenses

passed.name: HasUniqueTag
passed.description: Checking if container has a tag other than 'latest', so that the image can be uniquely identified.

passed.name: LayerCountAcceptable
passed.description: Checking if container has less than 40 layers.  Too many layers within the container images can degrade container performance.

passed.name: HasNoProhibitedPackages
passed.description: Checks to ensure that the image in use does not include prohibited packages, such as Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) kernel packages.

passed.name: HasRequiredLabel
passed.description: Checking if the required labels (name, vendor, version, release, summary, description) are present in the container metadata.

passed.name: RunAsNonRoot
passed.description: Checking if container runs as the root user because a container that does not specify a non-root user will fail the automatic certification, and will be subject to a manual review before the container can be approved for publication
